item.description:
The right was to start your Friday night out! Why pay a cover charge? This event has it all!

A social and professional networking event for Boston's finest. Break out of the pack at our newest event, Sparkle and Shine!

Bring a friend, meet new ones, relax and indulge yourself in a private lounge at sleek, modern and hip Vlora in Copley Square.

Original jewelry designs will be on display and for sale.

Custom designs, raffles and giveaways throughout the event.

Music by DJ Farhan of the SYNERGY events.

Complimentary hor d'oeurves.

No Cover Charge/ Cash bar

Sparkle and Shine on Facebook!

Oh...of course for those interested in the clubs, we'll have discount/free admission for ladies and gentlmet at a nearby club for the after party!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have the raffle tickets! Come see me when you arrive!
item.name: Sparkle and Shine! Cocktails, Jewelry, and its FREE!
